


python -m virtualenv .venv
. .venv/bin/activate
pip install -e app

python scs_generator.py
## USE the above for auth generator

python scs_jwt.py  

## USE the above for token

uvicorn app.main:app --port 8005
cd auth-server
docker compose up -d

curl -i http://localhost:8005/hello
